Articles.Content: I cant see the photo on the computer that I'm using right now (for specific reasons) but the title sounds like you didnt download it right. Make sure you take the contents inside of the mods gameData file, and put it in your KSP gameData by doing copy (or cut) then paste. good luck
That message is pretty detailed regarding how to seek help, and posting one screenshot to the forum with no further info is not one of the options given:

Okay, switched computers and now I can see the photo, and AAMOF I have actually had the exact same problem as you, and say, where did you download KSP from? I had the same problem because I bought KSP from the KSP webstore and all the guides assume you bought it from  Steam, so I had a huge trial-and-error time with mods.

 

And no, do not send me guides on how to mod KSP. I know how to do it.

Please read this:

To find the cause of the problem we need log files- Player.log if you can, KSP.log if you can’t, plus the Kopernicus logs as instructed by the message in the screenshot- plus a mod list. What planet pack were you trying to use?
